Top 30 Chinese Songs | Generated by AI

Home 2025.09

Here’s the list of 30 Chinese songs, translated into English, while keeping the title in Chinese:

30首中文歌曲列表 (List of 30 Chinese Songs)

Based on a comprehensive consideration of YouTube statistics, YouTube Music, Billboard charts, historical impact, and KTV data, here’s a list of 30 Chinese songs chosen for their widespread influence, high play counts, and cultural significance. This list aims to cover classic and popular songs from different eras and styles, and while it may not satisfy everyone’s preferences, it strives for comprehensiveness and representativeness.

Classics and Enduring Works

  1. 月亮代表我的心 (The Moon Represents My Heart) - Teresa Teng: An eternal classic in Chinese music, incredibly popular, a must-sing in KTVs.
  2. 千言万语 (Thousands of Words) - Teresa Teng: Another signature song by Teresa Teng, genuinely emotional and widely circulated.
  3. 上海滩 (The Bund) - Frances Yip: The iconic theme song of a classic TV series, grand and deeply ingrained in people’s hearts.
  4. 童年 (Childhood) - Lo Ta-you: One of the representative works of the godfather of Chinese pop music, full of poetry and nostalgia.
  5. 光阴的故事 (The Story of Time) - Lo Ta-you: Another classic by Lo Ta-you, chronicling the changes of an era and youthful memories.
  6. 明天会更好 (Tomorrow Will Be Better) - Various Artists: A representative charity song in Chinese music, full of hope and strength.
  7. 一生何求 (What More Can I Ask For) - Danny Chan: A deeply moving classic Cantonese song, a KTV evergreen.
  8. 吻别 (Kiss Goodbye) - Jacky Cheung: The song god Jacky Cheung’s masterpiece, one of the best-selling Chinese albums in Asia.

Popular Hits and KTV Favorites

  1. 青花瓷 (Blue and White Porcelain) - Jay Chou: Jay Chou’s classic blend of Chinese style and R&B, a KTV favorite.
  2. 发如雪 (Hair Like Snow) - Jay Chou: Another iconic Chinese-style song by Jay Chou.
  3. 晴天 (Sunny Day) - Jay Chou: A song full of youthful memories, deeply loved by young people.
  4. 泡沫 (Bubble) - G.E.M.: G.E.M.’s breakout hit, showcasing her superb vocal skills, with extremely high YouTube views.
  5. 喜欢你 (Like You) - Beyond: A classic by the Hong Kong rock band Beyond, deeply moving and highly sung in KTVs.
  6. 海阔天空 (Boundless Oceans, Vast Skies) - Beyond: Another representative work by Beyond, full of inspiration and sentiment.
  7. 死了都要爱 (Must Love Until Death) - Shin Band: A representative rock ballad, a must-sing for belting out in KTV.
  8. 倒带 (Rewind) - Jolin Tsai: Pop diva Jolin Tsai’s classic love song.
  9. 勇气 (Courage) - Fish Leong: A representative Chinese love song, deeply loved by those who have experienced heartbreak, a KTV favorite.
  10. 小幸运 (A Little Happiness) - Hebe Tien: A movie theme song that has become extremely popular in recent years, with massive YouTube views.
  11. 告白气球 (Love Confession) - Jay Chou: A lighthearted and romantic song, widely loved by young listeners.
  12. 修炼爱情 (Practice Love) - JJ Lin: One of JJ Lin’s representative works, with delicate emotions and excellent singing.
  13. 可惜没如果 (Too Bad If There’s No If) - JJ Lin: Another one of JJ Lin’s KTV favorite love songs.

Recent Hits and Continuing Influence

  1. 体面 (Decent) - Kelly Yu: Theme song from the movie “The Ex-File 3,” genuinely emotional, maintaining its KTV popularity in recent years.
  2. 漠河舞厅 (Mohe Dance Hall) - Liu Shuang: A folk song that went viral in recent years, with a unique narrative and atmospheric feel.
  3. 野狼Disco (Wild Wolf Disco) - Gem: A catchy retro disco track that became incredibly popular on social media and in KTVs.
  4. 嘉宾 (Guest) - Zhang Yuan: A popular emotional song in recent years, widely circulated on platforms like Douyin.
  5. 大鱼 (Big Fish) - Zhou Shen: The impression song from the animated film “Big Fish & Begonia,” Zhou Shen’s unique voice gives the song a fairy-like quality.
  6. 渡口 (Ferry) - Tsai Chin: Though an older song, her rich voice and profound lyrics have earned it a large loyal audience on YouTube.
  7. 成都 (Chengdu) - Zhao Lei: A representative folk song that touches hearts with its simple lyrics and deep emotion.
  8. 消愁 (Drown Sorrows) - Mao Buyi: A song that made a splash in a talent show, with deep and resonant lyrics.
  9. 等你下课 (Waiting for You to Finish Class) - Jay Chou: A popular single released by Jay Chou in recent years, continuing his lyrical style.
